questions.question: What is the generic block HTML tag that acts as a container to organize portions of code?
Which attribute does an img tag need to help people using screenreaders?
Where is the meta tag located in the HTML document?
Which attribute on a HTML element allows a tooltip about the element to be displayed?
Which attribute allows the elements of a table to span multiple columns ?
How is a hyperlink from an <a> element opened in an <iframe> element on the same webpage ?
options: Adding an id attribute to the iframe and using it as the value of the target attribute of the a tag element.
Adding a name attribute to the iframe and using it as the value of the target attribute of the a tag.
Changing the target attribute value of the a tag element to _blank
Forget it, you can't open links on the same webpage as the <a> element.

questions.question: Why are semantic HTML elements important?
options: They help search engines and other user devices to determine importance and context in a webpage.
They are shorter to type out.
They make the internet more colourful.
They allow you to use HTML in the python programming language.

questions.question: What are HTML description lists commonly used for?
options: To display the styles of the webpage.
To implement a glossary or to display metadata(a list of key-value pairs).

questions.question: Which element defines an HTML dropdown list?
Which element in the head of the HTML document makes the webpage responsive?
Which tag allows characters to be displayed in a bold font?
Which audio attribute allows an audio file to play automatically?
What is the <pre> HTML element used for?
options: It represents a preformatted text that should be rendered how it is written in the HTML file.
Helps the prettier code formatter work more efficiently.

questions.question: Which HTML character entity represents a non-breaking space?
